An exercise for a Christian familie; contayning a short sum of certayne poyntes of Christian religion, with certaine godly prayers, psalmes, & thanksgiuings, both before and after meales. Very necessary to be vsed in euery Christian familie. / By R.M.. R. M.
[2], 238 p.
Printed by Robert Waldegraue., At London : 1585..
Title vignette (royal arms); head-pieces, initials. Signatures: [A]-K¹². Reproduction of original in: Cardiff Central Library (Wales).
